TopicTitle: 1.0.5 KSP previous version not working on Steam

Articles.Content: A mod I want to download RSS Expansion by pozine https://mods.curse.com/ksp-mods/kerbal/232931-rss-planets-moons-expanded-0-11-0   requires 1.0.5. Steam offers a revert but it wont work for me. It will download and say the version of KSP is 1.0.5 on steam but if I look on CKAN or Launch the game, it says the version is 1.3. does anyone know how to help? Cheers!
I have no idea why Steam isn't working correctly, but there's a version of the mod for 1.1.2, which you might have more luck with.
Unfortunately I can't download 1.1.2. Steam reverts are only for 1.0.5, 1.1.3, and 1.2.2. I'll try though. Thanks for the help!
